Posts.Content: Well I do exactly the same- phew I'm not alone....oh, so that means Londonlass, nor are you! ((Xx))
Posts.Title: Now I know.....

Posts.Content: Be yourself, ask away, all my thoughts are with you- tricky day for you but you are prepared. Hold on to your gut feelings and you will come out pleased that you had a little control.  Thinking of you xxxxx
Posts.Title: Now I know.....

Posts.Content: Well done- good to be honest and open. Not easy but steps in the right direction. Look at how many care for you. Xx
